Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 25th overall pick, by Boston (FBA) in 1979...
Released by Boston (FBA) on 3/2/1979...
Earned first career win on 4/25/1985...
Won World Championship with Boston (FBA) in 1985...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/19/1988 with a Sore Shoulder, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by Gashouse on 2/14/1991 to a 4-year deal worth $1,663,200 per year...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/6/1991, off Jeffrey Fretwell (SYR)...
